src:
Slavia Praha v Lige majstrov zaskočila Barcelonu, zo slávneho Camp Nou si vezie bod
05 Nov 2019, 21:35 by Webnoviny
5.11.2019 (Webnoviny.sk) – Futbalisti Slavie Praha nečakane získali bod po remíze 0:0 na trávniku slávneho FC Barcelona v utorkovom zápase štvrtého kola skupinovej fázy Ligy majstrov. Slavia získala druhý bod v prestížnej „milionárskej“ súťaži, ale zostala na poslednej štvrtej priečke v F-skupine. FC Barcelona je s 8 bodmi priebežne na čele.
Na Camp Nou sa český majster úspešne ubránil ofenzíve španielskeho šampióna, ktorý prestrieľal hostí v pokusoch na bránku 6:0. Ani jedna lopta však neskončila za chrbtom skvelého Ondřeja Kolářa.
Najväčšiu šancu domácich mal po polhodine hry Lionel Messi. Strelu argentínskeho lídra FCB zastavilo brvno. „Blaugranas“ naďalej ťahajú v Lige majstrov na domácom štadióne obdivuhodnú sériu. Od septembra 2013 neprehrali pred vlastnými fanúšikmi už 34 zápasov po sebe, aktuálne pridali štvrtú remízu.
Liga majstrov 2019/2020
4. kolo skupinovej fázy – utorok
F-skupina:FC Barcelona (Šp.) – Slavia Praha (ČR) 0:0
Viac k témam: Liga majstrovZdroj: Webnoviny.sk – Slavia Praha v Lige majstrov zaskočila Barcelonu, zo slávneho Camp Nou si vezie bod © SITA Všetky práva vyhradené.
text:
Slavia Prague in the Champions League has taken Barcelona by surprise and takes the point from the famous Camp Nou
05 Nov 2019, 21:35 by Webnoviny
5.11.2019 (Webnoviny.sk) - Football players Slavia Praha unexpectedly gained a point after a draw 0: 0 on the turf of the famous FC Barcelona in Tuesday's match of the fourth round of the Champions League group stage. Slavia scored second in the prestigious “Millionaire” contest, but remained at the last fourth place in the F-group. FC Barcelona is at the forefront with 8 points.
At Camp Nou the Czech champion successfully defended the offensive of the Spanish champion, who beat the guests in attempts to score 6: 0. However, neither ball ended up behind the great Ondřej Kolář.
After half an hour of the game Lionel Messi had the biggest chance for the home team. Argentinean leader FCB stopped the bar. The “Blaugranas” continue to draw a remarkable series in the Champions League at the home stadium. Since September 2013, they have not lost 34 consecutive games in front of their own fans, they have now added a fourth draw.
Champions League 2019/2020
4th round of group stage - Tuesday
F-group: FC Barcelona (Sp.) - Slavia Prague (CZ) 0: 0
More on Topics: Champions LeagueSource: Webnoviny.sk - Slavia Prague in Champions League has taken Barcelona by surprise, takes the point from the famous Camp Nou © SITA All rights reserved.
